text: Does the pretrained VGG19 in Metalhead take BGR or RGB inputs? In Keras it takes BGR input

elements.text: Does the pretrained VGG19 in Metalhead take BGR or RGB inputs? In Keras it takes BGR input

text:
Thanks <@UC4QQPG4A>
I have a question,
`return Float32.(permutedims(im, (3, 2, 1))[:,:,:,:].*255)`
Why do we need the color values to be multiplied by 255 here?
Code is from the last line of preprocess() in metalhead
<https://github.com/FluxML/Metalhead.jl/blob/master/src/utils.jl#L65>
I assume it is because the values are in a different range after doing the color normalization?
